quotes: The ink of a scholar is worth a thousand times more than the blood of a martyr -- Lupe Fiasco
Everyday women and men become legends -- Common
No matter how hard it gets, stick your chest out, keep your head up and handle it -- Tupac
Reach for the stars so if you fall you land on the clouds -- Kanye West
Keep integrity at every cost -- Nas
I took my bruises, took my lumps, fell down and got right back up -- Eminem
Everybody dies but not everybody lives -- Drake
Bow in the presence of greatness -- Kanye West
Everything is everything. What is meant to be, will be -- Lauryn Hill
Nevermind what the haters say, ignore em til they fade away -- T.I.
